name: FearedMonkey
description:
A monkey running away from a machine that is destroying his home i.e. forest.
Climb through the tree to save yourself.

Avoid unwanted harm like Dark Spikes which will damage you and decrease your Health, and empty spaces you kill you instantly.
You can eat banana to gain one Health.


Controls  -  Z ,  X  ,  C  ,  V  ,  B
Credits  -  Fuggii , Pirate Song
All art is created within this jam time.
Sound is created by Bfxr except the pirate song.
